original_solution_mapping.L1: For the night he was able to intake 110 + 310 + 215 = <<110+310+215=635>>635 calories
original_solution_mapping.L2: For breakfast and lunch, he was able to intake 560 + 780 = <<560+780=1340>>1340 calories
original_solution_mapping.L3: So, for the entire day Voldemort was able to intake 1340 + 635 = <<1340+635=1975>>1975 calories

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 7025.
    Returns: the number of calories Voldemort can still take.
    """
    # L1
    cake_calories = 110 # a piece of cake that has 110 calories
    chips_calories = 310 # 1 pack of chips that contained 310 calories
    coke_calories = 215 # a 500 ml bottle of coke that has 215 calories
    night_intake = cake_calories + chips_calories + coke_calories

    # L2
    breakfast_calories = 560 # 560 calories
    lunch_calories = 780 # 780 calories
    day_intake_breakfast_lunch = breakfast_calories + lunch_calories

    # L3
    total_daily_intake = day_intake_breakfast_lunch + night_intake

    # L4
    daily_limit = 2500 # 2500 calorie intake limit per day
    remaining_calories = daily_limit - total_daily_intake

    # FA
    answer = remaining_calories
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: For the night he was able to intake {cake_calories} + {chips_calories} + {coke_calories} = <<{cake_calories}+{chips_calories}+{coke_calories}={night_intake}>>{night_intake} calories
For breakfast and lunch, he was able to intake {breakfast_calories} + {lunch_calories} = <<{breakfast_calories}+{lunch_calories}={day_intake_breakfast_lunch}>>{day_intake_breakfast_lunch} calories
So, for the entire day Voldemort was able to intake {day_intake_breakfast_lunch} + {night_intake} = <<{day_intake_breakfast_lunch}+{night_intake}={total_daily_intake}>>{total_daily_intake} calories
Therefore, he can still intake {daily_limit} - {total_daily_intake} = <<{remaining_calories}={remaining_calories}>>{remaining_calories} calories.
